name: Ext_R5_CarePlan_basedOn
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.CarePlan.basedOn for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.basedOn from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: A higher-level request resource (i.e. a plan, proposal or order) that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.
element.comment: `CarePlan.basedOn` maps to R4B `CarePlan.basedOn`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ServiceRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RequestOrchestration)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/NutritionOrder)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: A higher-level request resource (i.e. a plan, proposal or order) that is fulfilled in whole or in part by this care plan.
